title: The Pointless Coin – Meme Coin Website (theuselesscoin.com replica)

requirements.text: Create a full-page hero section with a large animated coin logo (using the generated coin image), the headline 'THE POINTLESS COIN', a punchy meme-style tagline (e.g. 'Absolutely no utility. Completely pointless. 100% yours.'), and two CTA buttons: 'Buy Now' and 'Join Community'.

quotes: make the site exactly the same but make it the pointless coin

Coin image is displayed prominently and rotates or bobs with a CSS animation
Headline reads 'THE POINTLESS COIN' in large display typography
Two CTA buttons are visible and styled consistently with the theme

requirements.text: Create a sticky navigation bar with the coin logo, the name 'The Pointless Coin', and anchor links to all page sections (e.g. About, Tokenomics, How to Buy, Roadmap, Community).

constraints: No backend data persistence is required — the site is fully static/frontend only

No price ticker or live market data feeds

required: A shiny gold coin with a bold letter 'P' embossed in the center, cartoon-style with a gleaming metallic finish and a slight comic glow effect around the edge, circular format (pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png)
